attributes.action: retain licensing for canoes and unpowered craft on UK Inland Waterways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is in direct response to that calling for free access to all Inland Waterways by unpowered craft. 
The preservation of our waterways network relies in part on revenue generated from licence fees. All boaters who use the navigable canal and river systems have a moral responsibility to contribute towards their upkeep, provided the licence fees are set at reasonable and affordable levels.
